abstract: HSBC will offer consumers a “taste” of the Wimbledon tennis tournament by dishing out a favorite treat of visitors to the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club: strawberries and cream.
snippet: HSBC will offer consumers a “taste” of the Wimbledon tennis tournament by dishing out a favorite treat of visitors to the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club: strawberries and cream.
lead_paragraph: 3:54 p.m. | Updated For its fourth annual promotion in New York centered on its sponsorship of the Wimbledon tennis championships, HSBC will offer consumers a “taste” of the tournament — literally as well as figuratively.

headline.main: A Bank and the ‘Taste’ of a Tournament
